To survive, the player must roam the vast terrain in search of food and new weapons. The game is completely absent the zombies, but you'll still miss will not have. Here the wolves who want to tear you to pieces, and players here, intoxicated with fear of death. And, of course, you have to confront the wild, where at any time you can die from cold or lack of food. Survive alone is very difficult, you have to team up with other players to avoid becoming an easy target. Learn how to form groups, to produce "loot", led by machinery! In a word - survive!
